development.baseDir: sequelizeModel && echo "修改默认路径model`app/${baseDir}` as models, default to `model`"
development.delegate: sqlModel && echo "修改默认model, ctx[delegate]`, default to `model`"

define.注释: echo "timestamps是否支持自动生产created_at，updated_at.,deleted_at,自动生成的时间为标准时间. underscored是否支持驼峰转为表的下划线"
define.注释二: echo "freezeTableName不自动将表名转换为复数形式. paranoid删除是否自动插入时间"
